name: Smileball Adventure
description:
Smileball Adventure is a stylistic love letter to the computer games of the late 1980s and the early 1990s, and a tribute to the frustratingly hard games of today.

Play as Smileball through the first act of the game in this free demo!

(Smileball Adventure Demo 1 is a very early build of the game made in about two weeks. The files were corrupted halfway through and visual, audio, and performance bugs are very likely. Unless something obvious, easily fixable, or game-breaking is discovered, the demo will not be updated until a second demo is released. Many things, particularly the title screen, sound effects, and level design are subject to change.)
